participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. i have three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back, passionate about sports, and a bit of a risk-taker.
participant_2.background: i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders. i have a broken arm.
